section.p: As , Nage slides in and lightly blocks Uke's arm, at the same time placing his other hand on Uke's rear shoulder. Nage extends his blocking hand and performs a tenkan, pulling slightly on Uke's shoulder to take his balance. As Uke's rotational momentum carries him around, Nage performs a tenkai, pulls Uke's shoulder in closer to maintain connection, and raises his blocking hand up and over Uke's head, leading his thumb down Uke's spine, throwing Uke into a backward roll.

image.alt: Shomenuchi iriminage showing Nage sweeping Uke's arm as Nage begins his tenkan.
